ability.Storm Surge: On switch-in, this Pokemon sets Storm Surge on its side for 3 turns. Under Storm Surge, Electric moves' accuracy is 100%.
ability.Aircurrent: This Pokemon's Flying-type moves gain 20% additional power.

Thunder Strike.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Aerial Slash.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.

Storm Burst.effect: Has a 20% chance to cause confusion.

Gale Wing.effect: Has a 10% chance to cause flinching.

Volt Shield.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1 stage.
